info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023
rating_comment: Excellent place to stay if someone wants to stay close to the airport. Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This is a beautiful flat in a quiet location. The caretaker was extremely helpful with all our needs. Property gets cleaned every day. Parking space was also provided. We had a very comfortable stay and would recommend it for your stay in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Very impressive, massive 3 bedrooms with separate lounge, proper ac, no mosquitos. A great deal at that price!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Recommended if you want to stay here. Very nice place and cozy to stay. Had a problem with the aircond, but they settled it quickly. Host and co-host are very friendly and responsive. Thank you!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · June 2023,  · Group trip
rating_comment:
Good place for family hangout. Everyone associated with it is very responsive and helpful.
Recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Always it was excellent communication with the host and local contacts. During our stay we felt like our home. Nice, quiet and secured apartment with full of privacy. Elevator and 24/7 severity/caretaker and their help was great. House we found as described in the pictures. A big refrigerator was very helpful for us. WiFi and intercom was fully functional. Overall it was a great place for us to leave. Highly recommend this apartment who wants to stay in Uttara. No doubt for the price it was a great deal. Without any hesitation I will stay again. Thanks everyone whom I met during my stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: It was a good stay for my guests.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: It was a great stay, we enjoyed. We will be back soon! We recommend

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: It was just like staying at home. People’s are friendly and place is secure. Close to everything.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023
rating_comment: From host to caretaker and to owners, everyone made efforts to make our stay felt like home, the communication with host and caretaker were very transparent and they were very kind and supportive all the way. They went an extra mile to make us feel comfortable with whatever we requested for, and they were considerate to let us check out at a later time than many other hosts would normally approve of. Thank you.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The house was nice and the location is very good, but the house not very clean and it doesn’t match the pictures as shown, they also didn’t communicate very well, overall it was an OK experience

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: The host & co host mr. manowar is very amicable person. the place is very good. i will be visiting again

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022
rating_comment:
If someone wants family care and secured place in Dhaka. I will recommend Nurjahen place is one of the best.
More precisely, this apartment has 24/7 electricity and all facilities around the place are in a stone throwing distance.
Check in and check out is quite easy.
The staffs are very professional and friendly.
I appreciate for Mr. Shawan and Mr. Shayer's great cooperation.
We hope, we will visit this place again.
Thank you!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This apartment has everything for travelers. Before I reserve the apartment, I took a look at the reviews.
They kept literally everything in the apartment for our convenience.
Apartment is very nice, quiet and secured. I found family environment there. I would highly recommend this place to my friends and family.
Undoubtedly, 5 stars for the price and the quality.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The hosts Mr. Monowar and Mr. Shaon are such wonderful people. They were always available whenever we needed anything. I highly recommend this place. I would love to visit the place- if it's available- next time I come to Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We experienced a pleasant stay in this place. It was very safe and convenient location. The place was clean and spacious. The check-in and checkout process was very simple. The host was very friendly, flexible, and quick to response. I would like to stay in this place in my future trips as well.
